submission.description: Analyze personal carbon footprints and compare the impact of individual versus collective environmental actions.

submission.description: Focus on triple integrals in rectangular coordinates and applications in 3D volumes.
Practice changing the order of integration and using cylindrical coordinates.
Covers triple integrals in spherical coordinates and their geometric interpretations.
Introduction to vector fields and line integrals, including parametrizing curves.
Focus on the Fundamental Theorem of Line Integrals and conservative vector fields.
Covers Green’s Theorem and applying line integrals in the plane to compute area.
Written problems on partial derivatives and applications of multivariable functions.
Exercises focusing on multiple integrals and setting up correct bounds in different coordinate systems.
Short-answer questions on vector fields, line integrals, and fundamental theorems of calculus in higher dimensions.

assignments.name: Quiz 2
assignments.description: Covers integration techniques in cylindrical and spherical coordinates along with related applications.

assignments.name: Quiz 3
assignments.description: Tests knowledge of line integrals, vector fields, and Green’s Theorem.

submission.description: Covers basic weather concepts and introductory atmospheric science principles.
Reviews storm systems, wind patterns, and temperature variability.

assignments.name: Knowledge Checkpoint 1: "Something Old and Something New"

submission.description: Reflect on historical vs modern meteorological methods, and the evolution of weather prediction.
Investigate tornado formation, safety procedures, and real-world case studies.
Survey analyzing the aftermath of severe weather events and damage mitigation.
Collect and discuss data on damage patterns related to strong wind events.
